ssa-retirement-benefits.title: Retirement Benefits
ssa-retirement-benefits.headline: Retirement Benefits
ssa-retirement-benefits.source.name: Social Security Administration
ssa-retirement-benefits.summary: This benefit provides replacement income for qualified retirees and their families. Social Security is part of the retirement plan of almost every American worker.
ssa-retirement-benefits.criticalApplicat: Only one application is needed to apply for all the benefits offered by SSA.
ssa-retirement-benefits.eligibility.labe: You are at least 62 years old.
